I'll make a note of your concerns for your care team to review. You don't have to do anything just yet. Nurse: Great, examples of clear liquids include water, green tea, clear broth, light colored sports drinks, and jello or other gelatin without fruit or red color. Patient: You know you know what comes to mind? I know, but I don't know. I know that I know nothing.
